Details.Textbox24: The Tower Companies is a family-owned real estate developer and property management company located in the Washington, D.C. Metropolitan area. The company owns and operates approximately 4 million SF of commercial office, retail, and residential properties.
Details.Textbox29: 53 - Real Estate and Rental and Leasing
Details.Textbox41: 2000 Tower Oaks Blvd. Ninth Floor Rockville, Maryland US

list1_SourceName.SourceName: Source Emissions | 1707 L Electricity Consumption - Market Based Each year, Tower purchases 100% renewable energy wind RECs from Renewable Choice to offset our electricity usage. These are green-e certified RECs and they are unbundled to cover the entire Tower portfolio with some additional RECs purchased as well. For calendar year 2017, Tower purchased a total of 33,589 MWh worth of RECs.
